Localisation.Text: This is the quest selection screen.
You can pick a quest from those you have unlocked here. Just tap the card you want, then tap 'embark'.
You can edit your deck of cards here. This will allow you to customize your quest experience.
Are you sure you want to abandon the quest and return to the quest selection screen? You will lose any progress made, but keep any rewards you have earned.
Here you can choose what you want to encounter next. Tap a card to view more details about it, and to select it.
Tap here to see your current character information, including statistics and equipment.
Here you can see your current gold. You can use this to buy equipment in shops, or during encounters.
Click activate to use your ability on the selected tiles.
These are your abilities, provided by your equipment.
This is the power bar. You use the power collected here to use abilities, or when it is full you can discharge it all to shuffle the board.
This area contains the orbs you match. Make rows of three or more orbs of the same colour to match them.
Make rows of more than three to spawn a special orb, which when matched has a special effect.
This is the count of blocks you need to break to win.
This is the count you need to match to win.
This is your remaining health. Attacks will reduce it, and when it reaches 0 you will fail the level.
This is the count of enemies you need to kill to win.
This is the count of orbs of each colour you need to match to win.
This is the count of plates you need to get to break to win.
This is the count of items you need to get to the bottom of the board to win. If you can't see them on the board then they'll be in chests, inside blocks, or in enemies.
This is your remaining time. When it reaches 0 you will fail the level. It will only decrease when the board isn't updating, so act fast!
This is your remaining turn count. When it reaches 0 you will fail the level.
This is a block. Match in the tiles surrounding it to break it.
This is a chest. Match in the tiles beneath this to spawn coins. When there are no more coins to spawn, it will appear empty.
This is a sinkable item. If you move it to the bottom of the board you will successfully sink it.
This orb has been sealed. It won't move until the seal is broken. To break the seal use the orb in a match.
This is a friendly ally. Match in the surrounding tiles to replenish its health.
This is an enemy. The red bar beneath it is its remaining health. Match in the tiles surrounding it to damage it.
This enemy has damage resistance, represented by the gray pips on its health bar. At the end of each turn it will replenish those pips, so focus on those big hits!
This enemy has multiple stages, indicated by the orbs above its hp bar. When its hp bar is empty it will mutate into a new creature, so watch out!
This is an attack. The pips surrounding the skull indicate the turns remaining until it activates.
Match it like a normal orb to remove it from the board. If you fail to remove it then you will lose 1 health.
This is a usable ability, granted by your current equipment.
These pips show how much power you need to activate it.
When you have enough power you can tap this ability to begin to select targets for it. Note you won't be able to select it if there are no valid targets.
This is a plate. Match on top of this to break it.
This is a spreading field. Match in the tiles surrounding it to remove it and stop it spreading this turn.
Have an unknown chance to gain unknown rewards.
Have a {Chance} chance to gain {Reward} rewards.
Completing this encounter will cause it to advance.
This encounter came from the encounter deck.
This encounter came from the current character.
This encounter came from the current quest.
This encounter came from the current quest location.
The number of attacks you can take before dieing.
The bonus damage you do the first time you match next to a damageable object each turn.
The bonus damage you do with specials and abilities.
The amount of damage resistance you remove each time you hit something with damage resistance.
The bonus power you gain the first time you gain power each turn.
The bonus multiplier you gain each time you gain gold.
How much faster you move. This increases turn count, delay between monster attacks and abilities, and buff durations.
The amount of health you regenerate each turn.
When below half health this is the amount {MatchDamage}, {AbilityDamage}, and {PowerGain} is increased.
The percentage reduction in price of items from a shop.
The chance to block the damage from an attack as it hits.
When taking damage from an attack, the chance to hit back at a random enemy.
The chance to block the damage from an attack, then hit back at a random enemy.
The percentage increase or decrease to randomly apply to each statistic. Changes whenever you complete an encounter.
The value to subtract from enemy life as they spawn.
The amount of health you gain each time you kill an enemy.
The multiplier to increase buff duration by.
Affects your chance of gaining rewards.
You regain a portion of the damage you deal as health.
Can gain a bronze level reward.
Can gain a silver level reward.
Can gain a gold level reward.
The current encounter in the quest.
